questions.question: Choose the correct sentence for this picture.

choices.answer: Susan is taller than Elizabeth, but Jane is the tallest
Susan taller than Elizabeth, but Jane is the tallest.
Susan is taller than Elizabeth, but Jane is the most tall.
Kuwait has less people than China.
China has less people then Kuwait.
Kuwait has more people than China.

questions.question: Fix the mistake: New York is busyer than Fort Collins.

choices.answer: Fort Collins is less busy than New York
New York is more busy than Fort Collins.
New York is busier than Fort Collins.

questions.question: Fix the mistake: Chocolate is gooder than vegetables.

choices.answer: Chocolate better than vegetables.
Chocolate is better than vegetables.
Chocolate is better then vegetables.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence for this image.

choices.answer: Sally is younger then Tom, but Ellen is the youngest.
Sally is younger than Tom, but Ellen is the most young.
Sally is younger than Tom, but Ellen is the youngest.
Money is more important than happiness
Money is less importanter than happiness
Money is less important than happiness

questions.question: Fix the mistake: Mexico is the beautiful place in the world.

choices.answer: Mexico is the beautifulest place in the world.
Mexico is the most beautiful place in the world.
Mexico the most beautiful place in the world.
Mexico is the more beautiful place.

questions.question: fix the mistake: The US is more big than Kuwait, but China is the most big.

choices.answer: The US is more bigger than Kuwait, but China is the biggest.
The US bigger than Kuwait, but China is the most big.
The US is bigger than Kuwait, but China is the biggest.

questions.question: The weather yesterday was _____________ than it is today.

choices.answer: more sunny
sunnier
sunnyier
hotter
Watching movies is less exciting than studying
Watching movies is more exciting than studying
Watching movies is more exciting then studying.
Watching movies more exciting than studying.

questions.question: Fix the mistakes: Your car is newer from mine.

choices.answer: Your car is newer than mine.
Your car newer than mine.
Your car than mine.
Your car is newest than mine.

questions.question: Shannon is youngest in her family.

choices.answer: Shannon is the youngest in her family.
Shannon is the more young in her family.
Shannon is the most young in her family.

questions.question: Fix the mistake: My shoes aren't enough big for my feet!

choices.answer: My shoes are too big for my feet!
My shoes isn't big enough for my feet!
My shoes aren't big enough for my feet!

questions.question: Pick the correct answer for this question: Do you like Grammar?

choices.answer: I like grammar very much!
I very like grammar!
I like grammar a lot!
I don't very like it.
